item.title: Lululemon Athletica Stock Reverses Early Decline, Rises 1.6% After Key Signal
item.description: Lululemon stock flashed a key trading signal - a power inflow alert - at a price of $187.10, after which LULU rose up to 1.6%. read more

item.title: Elon Musk's Favorability Rating Among Americans Has Tanked Since January
item.description: Elon Musk finished dead last in favorability in a recent Gallup poll asking Americans to assess 14 world figures. read more

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene's Palantir Bet Has Skyrocketed 142% Since She Bought It
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.)'s investment in Palantir has seen an impressive surge of 142% since April. read more
